name: Sword Saint Knight Dragon, Gramgrace
effect: [CONT](VC):Your persona ride also increases the [Power] of your back row units. [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, call it to back row center (RC), and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle your back row center rear-guard attacked, put that unit into soul, and draw a card.
flavor: Oh blade of mine, come forth from the blue sky. Nievern Reinforce--!

name: Divine Sister, Gateaubasque
effect: [CONT](VC):When you would ride from the ride deck, you may "[Soul-Blast 1]" instead of "Choose a card from hand, and discard it".
flavor: It's time for punishment♪ I'll make sure that you'll have enough!

name: Incision Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: It will be over in a flash! I won't even leave a scar!

name: Starting Magic, Starlily
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Do you remember? The day you first used magic.

name: Knight of Soaring Blade, Ffernbael
effect: [AUTO]Back Row Center (RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], choose one of your vanguards with "Gramgrace" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.
flavor: Soaring in the skies with dragons, with a shining blue sword.

name: Knight of War Damage, Fosado
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, [Counter-Charge 1]/[Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Resist no matter what. There is a chance of victory in adversity.

name: Knight of Soaring Refinement, Dfyn
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your grade 3 or greater unit in the center column attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Gramgrace" in its card name, that attacking unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.[AUTO]Front Row (RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Gramgrace" in its card name, and your units in the center column attacked two or more times this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Oh vile villain, prepare yourself for the blade of judgment!

name: Knight of Piercing, Cadwalla
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if you have four or more units, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or greater unit card from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not reveal a card, draw a card.
flavor: Is the duty of a knight to protect the law? No! It is to protect the lives of the people!

name: Divine Sister, Languedechat
effect: [CONT](RC):If your soul has a grade 3 or greater card, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: It feels a little prickly, right? That's the weight of your sins♪

name: Drilling Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a unit card from drop into soul], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card with the same card name as the card put into soul for this cost from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck.
flavor: I'll end it before you can feel the pain.

name: Knight of Gale, Cyneblugar
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: The perfect opponent! I'll respond with all of my wind!

name: Painkiller Angel
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], and draw a card.
flavor: There's no need to worry. It'll be over after a small prick.

name: Palladium Zeal Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck) [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: Overcoming adversity, to grasp victory.

name: Light Dragon Deity of Honors, Amartinoa
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Until end of turn, you also perform drive checks for the battles your rear-guards attack!
flavor: Rouse yourself with courage. Everyone has the capability to be a hero.

name: Daring Knight, Sauel
flavor: Let us be off, gloriously!

name: White Fang Witch, Disma
flavor: And now, which one shall go first~?

name: Operating Angel
flavor: Backup supplies are on the way. Survive until then.

name: Palpitation Angel
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: The droplets of life, be careful not to spill any more of it.

name: Magic of Alteration, Turnarr
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked while boosted, if your damage zone has three or more face down cards, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Won't you try a little harder? I'll provide support!

name: Knight of Rendering Flash, Cairbre
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, reveal it, call it to (RC) if it is a grade 2 or less unit card, and put it into hand if it is not. Shuffle the deck.
flavor: This flash of light shall become the first strike to shatter the skies.

name: Wayward Therapy Angel
effect: [CONT]:This card cannot be ridden, and cannot be normal called to (RC) from hand.[AUTO]:When this card is discarded from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this card to a back row (RC).
flavor: Skill is a given. Though finding the motivation can be difficult.

name: Bringer of Soaring Wind, Lachte
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):At the end of your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Gramgrace" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], choose a grade 3 unit card from your soul, and put it into hand.
flavor: Keep flying! Higher than ever!

name: Gratias Gradale
effect: Regalis Piece(You may only have one Regalis Piece in your deck, and use it a total of one time in a fight)Play this if you have a grade 3 vanguard with persona ride and you did not ride this turn!Activate persona ride. (Draw a card, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 this turn, and you are regarded to have persona rode)
flavor: Somewhere among the stars, the primordial blue fills the cup and waits for the seeker.
